summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 58th Street from 20th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest, by re-grading the roadway to conform with the existing curb, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1281 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
